title: Loading says my ping is 30. Game says my ping is 500
body: It seems like my ping likes to go up whenever I get in the actual game. On loading screen (before the game started), my ping was at 30. Once I started farming my lane, my ping jumped to 300 from 30~50. Is there a way to fix this? I had no background app running. It gets worse when trying to team fight or anything. This has happened before and riot  told that I had pocket loss issue. But, the problem is that this ping jump is very random. Sometimes, I have a very smooth game on the ping of 30 throughout. Sometimes, I have a game of 500~2000 ping on the same internet. I really wish to solve this problem and play the game :(

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes like this can be due to a weak connection or even packet loss, so the game server can't communicate what's going on in the match.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also give you some troubleshooting instructions specific to your issue.  Let me know what you find!

http://imgur.com/a/Lue9h

Here's the test from the game I had issue. I am also doing the Xbox thing (Turning it off) because my computer recently did windows 10 update. I will run another game and see if anything improved.

Thanks for the update, that helps a lot!  In addition to the common solutions provided in the log reader, I also recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities with your network.  Let me know how that works out for you!
